data.title: Robert Rodriguez says he cast Rose McGowan in Grindhouse as an F.U. to Weinstein
data.meta_description: Robert Rodriguez Says Casting Rose McGowan in Grindhouse Was an F-U to Harvey Weinstein (EXCLUSIVE) https://t.co/KlXTYfJsHV  Variety (@Variety) October 27, 2017 Rodriguez says he first met Rose at the Cannes premiere of Sin City where she said she would have loved to audition…
data.text:
Why the fuck would he "re-introduce" Rose to her rapist though? That's messed up.

Yeah, that's pretty sickening.

Everything about the op-ed is really weird tbh. Like the fact that he thought it would be morally just for Weinstein to pay for Rose's career re-launch without really going into the horribleness of making her work for him again?????

Also the fact that he blames "helping her" for his marriage dissolving????

IDEK.

"Making her"? Everyone knew the Weinsteins were producing the film, rose accepted the role knowing it. it's not like their involvement with the project was a nasty surprise thrown upon her after she signed on and couldn't get out.

His op-ed was messy for a lot of reasons but this was not one of them.

And he believed her about the assault based on HW’s reaction. Like. What!??

Mte omg

his logic and reasoning skills are non-existent tbh

mte wtf

Maybe she said it was ok to do because she wanted to see his reaction too? It doesn't say her thoughts on it.

Everything about his reasoning seems wtf worthy to me

Maybe its the wording?

Perhaps she hadn't told him at that point because he had just met her and they went over to harvey to make him uncomfortable about the blacklisting (but perhaps he didnt know his reaction was really towards the assault, but in his mind it was just that harvey didnt like rose for some reason and thats why he thought she felt she was blacklisted?)

And in retrospect he realizes the reason harvey was flustered?

If not... He's a complete asshole.

(no subject) - (Anonymous)

It’s a fucking MESS of a response. I’m stunned.

Mfte its a mess

MTE

Right? He seems very intent on painting himself as a hero/martyr/victim.

right how did none of his people stop this

Does he want a pat on the back or something? He's still an asshole.

The Truth is that Rob Rodriguez is as much of a Trash can as Alfonso Cuaron, Alejandro Inarritu, Guillermo DelToro, Diego Luna and Gael Bernal Garcia. A fucking city dump.

Why are you only mentioning latino men??

(no subject) - seeyoutuesday Expand

(no subject) - savage_land Expand

(no subject) - seeyoutuesday Expand

(no subject) - jensonanckles Expand

Gross

You're so anti-Mexican, I don't doubt you voted for Trump only because he's just as anti-Mexican.

(no subject) - savage_land Expand

(no subject) - seeyoutuesday Expand

what a saint

Thinks that he/others should have done more

Ya think. Go FUCK yourself scumbag.

So you were the real hero, Robert

good to know

Because my ex sold our movie to my rapist for distribution

Don't know if this is accurate, but I think Marilyn Manson was supposed to do a movie with the Weinsteins back in 2005/2006/2007

Sounds like he was taking advantage of being her lifeline.

The layers to this situation...each more disturbing than the last.

This makes him look so much worse imho. He looks like, maybe, two or three levels below Weinstein on the POS scale.

hmmmm...right...makes "sense."

Something in the milk isn't clean on this.

(no subject) - (Anonymous)

So....Marilyn Manson?

he isn't a director or producer though. as far as i know the only movie he was ever in with rose is jawbreaker, and he only had a cameo in that
